Libraries
```{r}
library(stars)
library(tidyverse)
```

#1) Bottom temperature
Load data
```{r}
bottomT_df=stars::read_ncdf("bottomT_l_ocellata.nc") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  drop_na(bottomT)

#Unique h3 ids
unique_h3=bottomT_df %>% 
  distinct(longitude,latitude) %>% 
  mutate(h3_id=h3jsr::point_to_cell(
    input = sf::st_as_sf(.,
                         coords = c("longitude", "latitude"),
                         crs = 4326),
    res = 6))

#Add h3_ids
bottomT_df_h3=bottomT_df %>% 
  left_join(unique_h3,
            by=c("longitude", "latitude")) %>% 
  mutate(year=lubridate::year(time)) %>% 
  group_by(h3_id,year) %>% 
  summarise(btemp_mean=mean(bottomT)) %>% 
  ungroup()

bottomT_df_h3$btemp_mean=as.numeric(bottomT_df_h3$btemp_mean)

#test
bottomT_df_h3_test=bottomT_df_h3 %>% 
  group_by(h3_id) %>% 
  summarise(n_yr=n_distinct(year))
```

Write
```{r}
saveRDS(bottomT_df_h3,"./bottomT_df_h3_2.rds")
```

#2) Salinity
Load data
```{r}
sal_df=stars::read_ncdf("salinity_l_ocellata.nc") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  drop_na(so)

#Unique h3 ids
unique_h3_sal=sal_df %>% 
  distinct(longitude,latitude) %>% 
  mutate(h3_id=h3jsr::point_to_cell(
    input = sf::st_as_sf(.,
                         coords = c("longitude", "latitude"),
                         crs = 4326),
    res = 6))

#Add h3_ids
sal_df_h3=sal_df %>% 
  left_join(unique_h3_sal,
            by=c("longitude", "latitude")) %>% 
  mutate(year=lubridate::year(time)) %>% 
  group_by(h3_id,year) %>% 
  summarise(sal_mean=mean(so)) %>% 
  ungroup()

sal_df_h3$sal_mean=as.numeric(sal_df_h3$sal_mean)

#test
sal_df_h3_test=sal_df_h3 %>% 
  group_by(h3_id) %>% 
  summarise(n_yr=n_distinct(year))
```

Write
```{r}
saveRDS(sal_df_h3,"./sal_df_h3_2.rds")
```
